text: Dr. Muhammad Najibullah Ahmadzai (; August 6, 1947 â€“ September 27, 1996), commonly known as Najibullah or Najib, was President of Afghanistan from 1987 until 1992, when the Mujahideen took over Kabul. Killed by Talibans in 1996. Category:Presidents of Afghanistan Category:1947 births Category:1996 deaths Category:Kabul University alumni Category:20th-century Afghan people
title: Muhammad Najibullah
